title: Add professional medical-themed background animations to header

requirements.summary: Add subtle, professional medical-themed background animations to the header section that complement the existing 'Oishi Heal Touch' branding without overwhelming the content
acceptanceCriteria: Background animations are visible in the header section containing the logo and 'Oishi Heal Touch' text
Animations use medical/healthcare theming (e.g., subtle pulse effects, flowing lines suggesting heartbeat or medical imagery)
Animations are professional and subtle, not distracting from header content
Animations work smoothly on both desktop and mobile viewports
Performance remains smooth with no janky animations

file_operations.description: Add medical-themed background animation elements (subtle pulse circles, flowing lines) to the header section using absolute positioning behind the existing logo and 'Oishi Heal Touch' text. Implement animations using CSS keyframes with transform and opacity for smooth performance. Ensure animations are contained within the header and do not interfere with sticky positioning or glassmorphism effects.

Add CSS keyframe animations for medical-themed effects including pulse animations (scale + opacity), flowing line animations (translateX/Y + opacity), and heartbeat-style rhythmic effects. Use will-change property for performance optimization and ensure animations respect prefers-reduced-motion for accessibility. Apply subtle durations (3-8 seconds) and easing functions for professional appearance.

requirements.summary: Ensure the header animations integrate seamlessly with the existing sticky header design and glassmorphism effects already present in the application
acceptanceCriteria: Animations do not interfere with sticky header behavior
Animations complement existing glassmorphism and premium design styles
Header text and logo remain clearly readable over the animated background
Animations maintain consistent visual coherence with the OKLCH color system and brand palette

file_operations.description: Position animated elements with z-index values that place them behind header content (logo and text) but above the header background. Use OKLCH color values from the existing brand palette with low opacity (0.1-0.3) to maintain readability and complement glassmorphism effects. Ensure animations maintain proper layering when header becomes sticky.

Apply color values from existing OKLCH brand palette (primary, secondary, accent colors) to animation elements with reduced opacity for subtle effect. Ensure animation styles work harmoniously with existing glassmorphism utilities and premium design system. Test color contrast to maintain WCAG accessibility standards for header text readability.
